Title: Four reporters convicted in Kyrgyzstan of call for mass riots, press freedom under siege warn watchdogs
Description: RSF condemns regime moves to 'muzzle independent journalism', says country’s media at 'critical turning point'.

Title: Kyrgyzstan: President botches attempt to dispel concerns about graft
Description: An opaque and massive transfer of wealth appears to be ongoing.

Title: Nine in 10 terrorist Tajiks recruited after migration period in Russia, study shows
Description: Disillusioned with life under regime back home, migrant workers come under influence of extremist imams and online groups.

Title: International consortium should build Kazakhstan’s first nuclear plant, says president
Description: Move in wake of atomic energy referendum 'Yes' vote could rile Moscow if main contractor status does not go to Russia’s Rosatom.

Title: Kazakhstan and Nasdaq-listed fintech Kaspi fight back against short seller’s report
Description: Regulator argues company is 'one of the country's systemically important banks' that is in full compliance with sanctions regimes.

Title: Short seller argues Nasdaq-listed Kazakh fintech heavyweight Kaspi 'misled' market over Russia links
Description: Company says claims made in Culper Research report misrepresents its business. Share price falls 22% after release of analysis.

Title: Uzbekistan expects volume of digital services to reach $3.4bn by year-end
Description: Uzbekistan is seeking to expand its tech sector, and boost exports of digital services.

Title: US lab invents a Fremen-tech water harvester
Description: An American lab has developed 'Fremen-like' technology that can extract moisture from the air even in a desert.

Title: Turkmen authorities scrambling to control scheme that gives citizens open access to the Internet
Description: Citizens find portal to the outside world.
